titleStmt.title: Aratea Digital
London, British Library, Cotton MS Vitel. A XII

editionStmt.edition: Digital edition according to TEI P5

availability.licence: This document is published under the Creative Commons licence Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0).

msContents.p:
4 - note on the front page almost like title in the centre large letters - rabanus de compoto
4v-8r dialogue, questions and answers on ecclesiastical issues
8r -9r- starts Abbo's Sententia abbonis de differentia circuli x... Inc. Studiosis astrologie primo sciendum est.. With a diagram of the planetary latitudes heart rate with inscription 'figura ad superiora dicta
9r-v bottom Then continues the second tractate Denique luna totius... Spacium dicimus followed by a diagram of the phases of the moon like in Dijon 448 on f. 10r
10r-v - Ut uero noueris non solum... Per totum mensem
10v - Hrabanus. Incipit p[ro]logus rabani ... Dilecto fratri rabano monacho gildas peccator ... With table of content on 11r-v, the work starts on 12r-40v
35r ... Hec autem omnia subiecta descriptio demonstrat congruentissime per illas columnellas - and adds tables for termines on the following folios
Expl.: et et[er]nitate se[m]p[er] manes p[er] henni trinus et unus omnps ds qui est benedictus in scla am
40v - Verses of Abbo
Idcirco certis dimensiu[m] partibus orbem... Uerterit ordo.
41r-v
Tetrasticon autenticum de singulis mensib
Hic iam mensis sacer est en aspice ut aris... Nunc tibi dno ludere uerna licet
Versus de ...
Primus romanas ordinis iane kalendas... Imbrifer asr mensis tu[m]q[ue] december adest
Versus de mensibus et signis xii
Dira patet iani romanis ianua bellis... Te gemalis hiemps
Versus de duodecim signis
Prim[us] adest aries obscuro lumine labens... Serpentes ludere pisces
Versus de cursu anni
Bissena mensium uertigine uoluntur annus...accurens atque kalendas
De octo tramitubus circuli decemnovennalis
Inea xre tuos prumae...aetate[m] lune monstrat q[] nouissimu[us] ordo
Versus de septem dierum
Prima dies phebi sacrato nomine fulget.. Et micat alma dies saturno septima summo.
42v-43r De septem miraculis . Primu[m] capitoliu[m] rome sali... Fine[m] faciunt ta[m] mirabil[is] edificu.
43r-44r - de duobus verticib[us] mundi
Duo sunt extremi uertices mundi q[uo]s appellabant polos... Ad ipsu[m] usq[ue] decurrit accipiens
44r- De diebus egyptiacis. Hos dies maxime obseruare debemus in quibus nullomodo neq[] ulla necessitate licet...
44v-45v De vocibus litterarum. Om[ne]s u[ero] littere a similitudine uocis caracteres acceperunt A subhiato ore... Cladius testatur dentes moti [f.45r]
A alfa agricola
B beata beatitudo
Ð“ gamma uirga correctionis...
Expl. Niacusin dcccc eneacoses.
45v-46r si uis scire cincurrentes in nona kl aprilis require ...que nullu[m] certu[m] numerum annorum tenet.
46r-63v Isidore DNR but starts: incipit liber Gilde peritissimi de natura rerum. Dommo et filio [left blank space] salute[m] Du[m[ te prestante[m]... Ex positiones numero quadraginta nouem Explicit
64r - t-o map or rather division of a circle with text on the provinces in each continent
64r - Signa in quibus singuli planetarum morentur scies si annos ab initio mundi scdm lxx per numeros hic eisdem planetis subiectos diuiseris... similiter de reliquis
64v De duplici ortu sinorum dubitantes aliquando hac ratione ...sol numquam accedit
65r - runic? Alphabet
65v-71r - Calendar one month one folio diff hand [mention epositio sci cuthberthti epi translatio Sci W..]
71v - 14th c hand?
72r - looks more like continental and slightly at least earlier hand
Aboree partes arctoi... Pistrix heridaniq[u]e fluenta
Same folio verse on the winds:
[Q]uatuor a q[ua]dro c[on]surg[]t limite uenti/
hisq[ue] octo gemini dext[ra] leuaq[ue] iugant[ur]
Atque ita bisseno circundant flamine mundum
Primus a partias arcto ospirat ab axe
Huic nostra nomen lingua e[st] septentrio fixum
...
Agrestenq[ue] grai uocitant cognomine prisco.
Written in two columns leaving the lower half blank perhaps for diagram?
72v- older calendar again of the 12 months but with the typical verses on top
78r-v blank
